Class BusStopInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BusStopInfo

  • public class BusStopInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about bus stops. Real bus stops within the GMPTE area are identified in a systematic way, but this is not the case for all the bus stops within the scope of the the pilot IBMS as some of them are outside the GMPTE area.

    Bus stops in the database are identified by an area and a name, e.g. "Hayfield, Bus Station" which is enough to uniqiely identify them. Areas also have shorter codes, we.g. "HAY"

    Some bus stops are timing points, meaning that they appear on the timetable associated with service times.

    None of the UCs in the pilot IBMS change bus stop information, so this interface provides read-only access
